description: Nestled in a corner of Sir Richard Roger's Station House, Freeweaver Studio is part of the rapidly emerging creative independent Deptford Market Yard community.

events.name: Drop in: Open Weaving Studio
events.notes: Japanese Weaving and Dyeing Studio at Deptford Market Yard

factsheet.heading: Japanese Weaving Studio at Deptford Market Yard
paragraphs: Open creative textile studio, handweaving, natural fibres, weaving demonstrations.
The Textile Component of SHE_SEES, a collaborative project between Erna Janine of Freeweaver Studio and photographer Emilie Sandy

factsheet.heading: Maritime Textiles exhibition
paragraphs: This year's contribution to Open House Festival at Freeweaver Studio in Deptford Market Yard is a maritime themed exhibition drawing inspiration from Deptford's sailmaking history

Contemporary textile artwork using natural fibres such as flax, hemp and jute.
The exhibition is an additional component to the SHE_SEES exhibition at Portsmouth Historic Dockyard

location.address: 7 Carriage Way, Deptford Market Yard, SE8 4BZ
travel_info: Additional travel info: We are located off platform 1 at Deptford Train Station

name: Open Textile Studio and Weaving Exhibition
